scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct a sensitive customer credit scoring model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages multiple queries to the model's prediction API, subtly varying input features to infer the model's internal parameters and logic.
initial_goal: Analyze customer creditworthiness using publicly available data and the bank's credit scoring API.
constraints: query_data_variety: limited to publicly available demographics
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large multinational bank uses a proprietary credit scoring model to assess customer creditworthiness. The model's internal workings are considered highly sensitive intellectual property.
